languages.text: Схрон с награбленным из контейнеров. Рядом в грязи валяется груда почерневших драгоценностей — их явно выкинули из ящика, чтобы освободить место для провизии и оружия.
A cache with goods stolen from the containers. You spot a pile of blackened jewellery in the dirt nearby, likely thrown out of the crate to make room for provisions and weapons.
languages.original_text: Схрон с награбленным из контейнеров. Рядом в грязи валяется груда почерневших драгоценностей — их явно выкинули из ящика, чтобы освободить место для провизии и оружия.

traits.locale_text: A cache with goods stolen from the containers. You spot a pile of blackened jewellery in the dirt nearby, likely thrown out of the crate to make room for provisions and weapons.

A cache with goods stolen from the containers. You spot a pile of blackened jewellery in the dirt nearby, likely thrown out of the crate to make room for provisions and weapons.

languages.text: Un alijo de material robado de los contenedores. Atisbas un montón de joyería ennegrecida entre el polvo, seguramente sacada de la caja para dedicar su espacio a más provisiones y armas.
languages.original_text: A cache with goods stolen from the containers. You spot a pile of blackened jewellery in the dirt nearby, likely thrown out of the crate to make room for provisions and weapons.

traits.locale_text: Un alijo de material robado de los contenedores. Atisbas un montón de joyería ennegrecida entre el polvo, seguramente sacada de la caja para dedicar su espacio a más provisiones y armas.

languages.text: 这个藏匿处藏着从集装箱里偷来的赃物。你在附近的泥地里发现了一堆已经发黑的珠宝，很可能是被人从箱子里扔出来，为了给补给品和武器腾出空间。
languages.original_text: A cache with goods stolen from the containers. You spot a pile of blackened jewellery in the dirt nearby, likely thrown out of the crate to make room for provisions and weapons.

traits.locale_text: 这个藏匿处藏着从集装箱里偷来的赃物。你在附近的泥地里发现了一堆已经发黑的珠宝，很可能是被人从箱子里扔出来，为了给补给品和武器腾出空间。

languages.text: コンテナから盗まれた物の隠し場所。食料や武器のスペースを作るために木箱から放り出されたような黒くなった宝飾品の山を近くの土砂に見つける。
languages.original_text: A cache with goods stolen from the containers. You spot a pile of blackened jewellery in the dirt nearby, likely thrown out of the crate to make room for provisions and weapons.

traits.locale_text: コンテナから盗まれた物の隠し場所。食料や武器のスペースを作るために木箱から放り出されたような黒くなった宝飾品の山を近くの土砂に見つける。

languages.text: Ein Lager mit Diebesgut aus den Containern. Du entdeckst ganz in der Nähe einige geschwärzte Schmuckstücke, die offenbar aus der Kiste geworfen wurden, um Platz für Proviant und Waffen zu schaffen.
languages.original_text: A cache with goods stolen from the containers. You spot a pile of blackened jewellery in the dirt nearby, likely thrown out of the crate to make room for provisions and weapons.

traits.locale_text: Ein Lager mit Diebesgut aus den Containern. Du entdeckst ganz in der Nähe einige geschwärzte Schmuckstücke, die offenbar aus der Kiste geworfen wurden, um Platz für Proviant und Waffen zu schaffen.

languages.text: Une cache abritant des marchandises dérobées dans les conteneurs. Non loin de là, vous repérez un petit tas de bijoux noircis à même la terre, probablement sortis de la caisse afin d'y entreposer des provisions et des armes.
languages.original_text: A cache with goods stolen from the containers. You spot a pile of blackened jewellery in the dirt nearby, likely thrown out of the crate to make room for provisions and weapons.

traits.locale_text: Une cache abritant des marchandises dérobées dans les conteneurs. Non loin de là, vous repérez un petit tas de bijoux noircis à même la terre, probablement sortis de la caisse afin d'y entreposer des provisions et des armes.

languages.text: Konteynerlerden çalınmış mallarla dolu bir zula. Dibindeki toprakta, kararmış bir mücevher yığını görüyorsun. Muhtemelen erzak ve silahlara yer açmak için öylece atılmışlar.
languages.original_text: A cache with goods stolen from the containers. You spot a pile of blackened jewellery in the dirt nearby, likely thrown out of the crate to make room for provisions and weapons.

traits.locale_text: Konteynerlerden çalınmış mallarla dolu bir zula. Dibindeki toprakta, kararmış bir mücevher yığını görüyorsun. Muhtemelen erzak ve silahlara yer açmak için öylece atılmışlar.
